text:
@GovAbbott With all due respect Governor Abbott, you are a moron. Or a liar. Or both. 

"Holy Ghost Parish in Houston had resumed masses on May 2...But...canceled services indefinitely as of May 14, a day after one of its priests, Father Donnell Kirchner, passed away"https://t.co/iLjtl7YAC6
